events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible since the product is not what I paid for.
The issue reported by the customer has been identified as a refund request due to receiving an incorrect item.
Support agent Alice Johnson has been assigned to handle the refund request for the incorrect order item.
Hello, I’m Alice from customer support. I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to assist you with your refund.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund quickly?
Thank you for responding. My order number is 789456123, and I have attached the photo showing the incorrect product that arrived.
We have reviewed the photo and order details. We will initiate a full refund immediately and provide a prepaid label for the return of the incorrect item.
Thank you for the prompt response and the refund offer. I appreciate the prepaid return label as well, that makes the process easier.
Your refund has been processed, and the return label has been sent to your email. Please ship the incorrect item back at your convenience.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund and were able to return the product with the provided label.
Yes, I received the refund and successfully returned the incorrect item. Thank you for the excellent support throughout this process.
We are closing your case as the refund is complete and the return has been confirmed. Thank you for your patience and please contact us anytime.
We have sent you a short satisfaction survey via email. We would appreciate your feedback on the support you received today.
